rows.label: tlk00240107_msg0001
rows.name: Grandpa has gotten so much better!

rows.label: tlk00240107_msg0002
rows.name:
He's been going backstage to
watch more often than before...

rows.label: tlk00240107_msg0003
rows.name:
And he's making progress on
Mister Vandham's story.

rows.label: tlk00240107_msg0004
rows.name:
Yes! I can't wait for it to
be on stage! You should all
come and see it, too.
